gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui
Class ContextAwareMenu

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.AbstractButton
                  javax.swing.JMenuItem
                      javax.swing.JMenu
                          gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui.ContextAwareMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public abstract class ContextAwareMenu
extends javax.swing.JMenu

This class defines the super class for menus used in MCT. Subclasses of this type of menus are context-aware, meaning that the availability this action depends on the ActionContext being passed in. A ContextAwareMenu contains a set of MenuSection. Each section contains a set of MenuItemInfos, and the sections are separated by a JSeparator.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

ContextAwareMenu

public ContextAwareMenu(java.lang.String text)
The constructor that takes a String parameter for the text of this menu.

Parameters:
text - the text appears in the menu

ContextAwareMenu

public ContextAwareMenu(java.lang.String text,
                        java.lang.String[] additions)
The constructor that takes a name for this menu and an array of menubar paths. These menubar paths define the extension points of this menu.

Parameters:
text - the text that appears in the menu
additions - an array of menubar paths of type @{link String}
Method Detail

getExtensionMenubarPaths

public final java.lang.String[] getExtensionMenubarPaths()
This method returns an array of menubar paths for extended menus and/or menu items.

Returns:
array of strings of the menu path additions that is non-null.

getMenuSections

public java.util.List<MenuSection> getMenuSections()
This method returns a list of @{link MenuSection defined in this ContextAwareMenu.

Returns:
a List of non-null sections

addMenuItemInfos

public final void addMenuItemInfos(java.lang.String menubarPath,
                                   java.util.Collection<MenuItemInfo> infos)
This method associates a collection of MenuItemInfo to the menubarPath.

Parameters:
menubarPath - the menubar path
infos - a Collection of MenuItemInfo

canHandle

public boolean canHandle(ActionContext context)
Given an ActionContext, this method determines the availability (i.e., either shown or hidden) of this menu.

Parameters:
context - the context
Returns:
a boolean that indicates the menu's visibility. Returns false by default.

initialize

public final void initialize()
This method initializes the MenuSections and MenuItemInfos defined in this ContextAwareMenu by invoking populate(), which is overridden by subclasses of ContextAwareMenu.

populate

protected abstract void populate()
This method is overridden by subclasses and should invoke addMenuItemInfos(String, Collection) that associates a collection of MenuItemInfo to a menubar path..
